article_metadata.description: By Jeff Bailey The major medical lab stocks fell hard on disappointing guidance. Quest Diagnostics and Laboratory Corp. of America (LH) were each down more than 10% on the news. DGX data by YCharts An armchair analyst might suppose that ObamaCare and health insurers’ efforts to cut costs are the culprits here, and that [...]
